PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Com a popularidade de dispositivos com GPS, mais e mais dados passam a ser anotados e distribuнdos na Internet. Isso pode ser verificado, por exemplo, atravйs do Wikipйdia, onde diversos pontos turнsticos possuem uma coordenada espacial (latitude e longitude). Esse projeto tem como objetivo extrair, de forma automбtica, informaзхes sobre pontos turнsticos que estгo disponнveis na Internet, armazenar essas informaзхes de forma eficaz, e desenvolver um aplicativo para dispositivos mуveis capaz de acessar esses dados e exibir, de forma eficiente, os pontos turнsticos mais prуximos do usuбrio em um dado momento. As informaзхes serгo exibidas na lнngua de interesse do usuбrio. O aplicativo tambйm vai permitir que os turistas indiquem pontos turнsticos, compartilhem comentбrios e possam avaliar cada ponto turнstico visitado. Dessa forma, outros turistas poderгo utilizar essas informaзхes para decidir os prуximos pontos que serгo visitados. Espera-se que esse sistema permita melhorar a experiкncia vivenciada pelos turista, alйm de aumentar o nъmero de pontos turнsticos visitados.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: With the popularity of GPS enabled devices, there are an increasing number of sites that have been annotated with a spatial location (latitude and longitude). The objective of this project is to collect information in the Internet about touristic points that have been annotated with a spatial location and have a text associated with them. Once this data have been collected, it will be stored and will serve a mobile application to assist a tourist during their visit indicating touristic places in the language of the tourist. Furthermore, the application will permit tourists to evaluate touristic points visited which will increase the experience of a tourist during their visit and increase the number of touristic points visited.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: O projeto visa a pesquisa na área de processamento de consultas spatio-textuais. Estas consultas possuem muitas aplicações, visto que existe uma quantidade crescente de dados contendo informações textuais e espaciais. Como exemplo de aplicações que manipulam dados spatio-textuais podemos citar o Twitter, Flickr, Foursquare, Wikipédia, OpenStreetMap e Facebook. Os principais objetivos do projeto são desenvolver novas técnicas para melhorar o desempenho das consultas existentes e propor uma nova consulta spatio-textual.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: ANБLISE GEOESPACIAL PARA IDENTIFICAR БREAS DE INFLUКNCIA DE OBJETOS ESPACIAIS CONSIDERANDO REDES DE ESTRADAS COM MULTICRITЙRIO
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Com o crescimento exponencial do volume de dados espaciais, cresce o interesse por novas tecnologias que permitam analisar a influкncia de locais de interesse para tomar decisхes estratйgicas. Computar a influкncia da localizaзгo de um objeto espacial de forma precisa й complexo e requer analisar uma grande quantidade de dados para obter um resultado preciso. Й preciso avaliar o melhor caminho entre diversos pontos, considerando redes de estradas e obstбculos ou empecilhos que retardem este caminho (multicritйrios como velocidade mбxima, trбfego ou nъmero de semбforos). Este projeto visa а pesquisa aplicada com o desenvolvimento de algoritmos e tйcnicas que permitam apoiar a anбlise geoespacial e a visualizaзгo de informaзхes em mapas, considerando grandes bases de dados e o melhor caminho entre objetos espaciais. Os principais objetivos sгo propor uma infraestrutura para armazenamento de grandes bases de dados espaciais e redes de estradas com multicritйrios; desenvolver consultas para apoiar a anбlise geoespacial e computar a influкncia de locais de interesse; e desenvolver tйcnicas de visualizaзгo que permitam perceber relaзхes de vizinhanзa, sobreposiзгo, fluxos e бreas de influкncia. As tecnologias propostas serгo avaliadas atravйs de experimentos prбticos feitos em parceria com instituiзхes e empresas que apoiam o projeto, considerando bases de dados reais e casos de uso prбticos.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: With the exponential growth in the volume of spatial data, there has been an increasing interest for new technologies that are able to analyze the influence of places of interest in order to support strategic decisions. Computing the influence of places of interest is complex and requires analyzing a huge amount of data in order to obtain precise results. This process requires processing the best path among several places, assuming road networks with multicriteria, such as maximum current speed, the movement of vehicles, and the amount of traffic lights. SIMBA (?Spatial Information Management using Big Data Analytics?) is a project funded by FAPESB with UEFS, UFBA, IFBA, SENAI e SERPRO as the main partners. This applied research project aims to develop algorithms and techniques to support Big Data analyses and visual analytics of spatial data. The main objectives are to propose an infrastructure to store big spatial databases and road networks with mutlicreteria; to create new queries and access methods to compute the influence of places of interest; to develop new visualization techniques to emphasize the neighborhood relationship among spatial objects such as coverage areas, traffic stream analyses and influence areas. The technologies proposed will be evaluated in research institutions and enterprises that support the project, assuming real databases and practical use cases.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: ANБLISE GEOESPACIAL PARA IDENTIFICAR БREAS DE INFLUКNCIA DE OBJETOS ESPACIAIS CONSIDERANDO REDES DE ESTRADAS COM MULTICRITЙRIO

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Recuperaзгo de Informaзгo na Web Profunda
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: As Ferramentas de Busca, popularmente conhecidas como Buscadores, surgiram logo apуs o aparecimento da Internet, para prestar um serviзo extremamente importante а comunidade: encontrar informaзгo na Web, apresentando os resultados de uma forma organizada, e com a proposta de fazк-lo de uma maneira rбpida e eficiente. A partir deste preceito bбsico diversas empresas se desenvolveram, chegando algumas a valer bilhхes de dуlares. Entre as maiores empresas se encontram o Google, o Yahoo, e o MSN da Microsoft. O maior volume da informaзгo disponнvel online, entretanto, nгo pode ser enxergado por esses Buscadores, uma vez que se trata de documentos que nгo sгo apontados por nenhum outro, ou seja, nгo existe link para esses documentos. A essa porзгo da Internet se deu o nome de WEB Invisнvel, ou WEB Profunda. Estudos apontam que a informaзгo pъblica na WEB Profunda pode ser atй 500 vezes mais volumosa que na WEB Superficial. Alйm de mais volumosa й tambйm informaзгo de maior qualidade ? geralmente validada por especialistas, nos mais diversos temas e бreas de interesse. O objetivo desse projeto й estudar tйcnicas da recuperaзгo de informaзгo tradicional e propor novas soluзхes adaptadas para resolver o problema de localizar documentos na WEB profunda.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: The Search Engines appeared after the emergence of the Internet to provide an extremely important service to the community: finding information on the Web. Several companies have developed Search Engines such as Google, Yahoo, and Microsoft. The largest amount of information available online, however, cannot be indexed by traditional SearchEngines, since there are documents that are not pointed by any other, ie, there is no link to these documents. This portion of the Internet is named Invisible Web or Deep Web. Studies show that public information on the Deep Web can be up to 500 times more massive than the Surface Web. In addition to voluminous information is also of higher quality - usually validated by experts in various subjects and areas of interest. The objective of this project is to study techniques of traditional information retrieval and propose new solutions tailored to solve the problem of finding documents on the web depth.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Information Retrieval in the Deep Web

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
O papel principal da Engenharia de Software Baseada em Componentes й sustentar que o desenvolvimento de sistemas deve ser baseado na composiзгo (montagem) de partes (componentes) reutilizбveis e que a manutenзгo do sistema consiste na personalizaзгo e substituiзгo dessas partes.
Isto requer metodologias estabelecidas e ferramentas de suporte capazes de viabilizar todo o ciclo de vida de um componente, desde sua concepзгo atй o produto final ser disponibilizado em uma ?prateleira?. Todo esse ciclo de vida deve ser amparado por tйcnicas de engenharia de software bem conhecidas [Sommerville, 2002], [Pressman, 2003], [PMBOK, 2003] e outras novas que precisam ser adaptadas e especializadas para esse tipo de desenvolvimento [Larman, 2004], [Heineman & Councill, 2001].
Nesse trabalho propхe-se o estudo e criaзгo de uma fбbrica de componentes [Clements, 2002], [SEI, 2000]. Cujo objetivo principal й sistematizar o desenvolvimento de componentes de software em um ambiente controlado por um processo rigoroso de desenvolvimento. Para isso, far-se-б necessбrio o desenvolvimento e utilizaзгo de ferramentas tanto na construзгo desses dispositivos de software quanto na sua validaзгo, manutenзгo e disponibilizaзгo.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Educaзгo

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The popularity of devices which are able to capture multimedia files such as cell phones and digital cameras has produced a huge amount of files: audios, images and videos. The biggest part of this material is being published on the Internet all the time. This brings a big opportunity and challenge to current information retrieval tools (Search Engines). Therefore, very important Search Engines (e.g. Google, Yahoo, and Ask) offer functionalities to retrieve multimedia files. However, they fail for not providing specific solutions for multimedia information retrieval such as better Media annotations and query specific filters. This paper tries to fill this gap presenting the multimedia annotation and ranking solutions developed and integrated in the MuSE (multimedia search engine). MuSE is specialized in the location, storage, and retrieval of audios, images, and videos.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In order to minimize limitations on teaching and learning of Software Engineering through traditional methods, the undergraduate course in Computing Engineering of UEFS has employed thematic projects that integrate several knowledge areas, developed by a small team of students working at different levels (development, engineering and management). This paper describes the Annual Project course and makes a critical evaluation based on the experience acquired by the teachers after offering this course eight times.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Atividades dos serviзos de tecnologia da informaзгo

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Recommender systems are data filtering systems that suggest data items of interest by predicting user preferences. In this paper, we describe the recommender system developed by the team named uefs.br for the offline competition of the 15th ECML PKDD Discovery Challenge on building a recommendation system for given names. The proposed system is a hybrid recommender system that applied a content-based approach, a collaborative filtering approach and a popularity approach. The final recommendation is composed by the results of these three different approaches, in which parameters where optimized according to experiments conducted in datasets built from train data.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The Spatial Keyword Preference Query is a new query type that aims to locate objects of interest, looking the spatial neighborhood of these objects. This query receives as parameter a set of objects of interest (e.g. hotels), a definition of neighborhood of interest (e.g. radius of 100m from the hotels) and a set of keywords of preference (?Mexican bar?); and returns the k best hotels ranked in terms of their vicinity with other spatial objects whose text is relevant for the query keywords. To the best of our knowledge, this query type has never been proposed before and it is an interesting tool to new spatial information systems. This paper presents a Master Thesis Project that aims to specify this new query type, presenting and evaluating new techniques to process it efficiently.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: With the popularity of devices that are able to annotate data with spatial information (latitude and longitude), more and more spatial data are becoming available. This has attracted the attention from the research community in the processing of advanced spatial queries. In this article, we study a new query type named Top-k Spatial Keyword Preference Query that selects objects of interest based on the textual relevance of other spatio-textual objects in their spatial neighborhood. This article introduces this new query type, presents three algorithms for processing the query efficiently and goes over an extensive experimental evaluation to study the performance of the algorithms proposed, employing real datasets.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Redes Complexas de Homфnimos para Anбlise Semвntica Textual
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Homonyms's Complex Networks to Semantic Analysis Textual

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Atividades dos serviзos de tecnologia da informaзгo

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Study centres in natural language processing already spread and the study have several applications. Relate with this research area, it is common the use technic for manipulation a text. These technic is be able to determine the word morphology and the word syntax. There are tools that do this work, however adding engines for semantic identification of the words is essential for increase the automatic understanding the used language. Objective: On the basis of that, This paper present the process of using complex networks as a comparative database to determine by context the meaning of words that express different positions. Moreover, they are classified as same morphology and syntax , as with some homonyms. Methodology: Through of a experimental methodology, the model proposed it is based in consolidate researches in Natural Language Processing for building a Complex Network that receives as vertices the words of a certain text and establishes its connections from the occurrence of adjacency between these terms. Therefore, observing the variations of network, it is identified how to textual namesakes are related and through an context analyzed how if be there, check whether it is used to express more than one meaning. Results: A generic process with stages of preprocessing, building of a Complex Network used to Natural Language Processing for the building of a network homonyms to extract semantic information textual. Conclusions: The analyze of homonyms selected and labeled is the process not only morphosyntatic, adding semantic in the phrase, paragraph or text where the words are applied. However, with Natural Language Processing an events and philosophical facts can be better analyzed through of a world written textually, for example, the power of argument and the writing of an author profile.

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO-INGLES: Representing Information of Deep Web Data Bases

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONCL.NOME-DA-INSTITUICAO: UNIVERSIDADE ESTADUAL DE FEIRA DE SANTANA (UEFS)

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: There are many Deep Web Data Bases. It is important to represent the information of each specific database in order to associate it with a query. Therefore, it is important to use techniques for collecting the information and selecting a good representative way to store it.

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO: Identificando Bases de Dados Espedнficas na Web

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONCL.NOME-DA-INSTITUICAO: UNIVERSIDADE ESTADUAL DE FEIRA DE SANTANA (UEFS)

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Recent studies point that the largest and more valuable portion of the information available on the Internet cannot be easily accessed by conventional search engines. This hidden information is behind the search fields of specialized-content Websites. This work presents a heuristic to automatically identify Deep Web Data Bases through a specialized Web Crawler, capable of navigating the Web in an intelligent and efficient manner.
